Text: If spec ops held a gun to my head i still wouldn't watch this god forsaken movie.

Actually the film is B, but isn't so bad if you like fairly mindless action movies like Steven Segal (Lawman Wanker!). It could have more humour, the script could be better but the plot is ok. My one real critisism is the sound. Rookie mistake of too much background and not enough treble on the actors. This leaves you straining slightly to hear the dialogue over the music and background noises. It's been compressed so when it goes dark you can see vertical lines. When its bright its ok.

Right I've seen the whole movie now and even though my previous complaints apply I have to say that the story is good, although it could have been made better. I suspect this will be copied and done with more finness in the future. I appreciate that the Americans have more respect for my countrys democracy than their own, however The US is dragging us all into shit due to their almost total corruption in government. Great story, old story - already thANKS TO bUSH & Co. But they will never win with money because love and life conquers all. Idiots are corrupt, idiots kill. Idiots are killed. Presidents and Prime Ministers who endorse this are Murderers who must be judged and convicted. This should include BUsh, Blair, Chainey, Rumsfeld, Wolfawtz and the rest. For the CIA to try and kill Ausange is an act of war AGAINST US ALL!
DEATH TO GREED AND CONTROL THROUGH VICTIMLESS CRIME!
